content: रौद्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (द्रा-द्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [रुद्र-अण्] {@--1@} ‘Rudra-like’, violent, irascible, wrathful. {@--2@} Fierce, savage, terrible, wild. {@--3@} Addressed to Rudra (as a hymn). {@--4@} Bringing misfortune, calamitous. --द्रः {@--1@} A worshipper of Rudra. {@--2@} Heat, ardour, warmth, passion, wrath. {@--3@} The sentiment of wrath or furiousness; see <ls>S. D. 232</ls> or <ls>K. P. 4.</ls> {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama, {@--5@} Winter. --द्रं {@--1@} Wrath, rage. {@--2@} Formidableness, fierceness, savageness. {@--3@} Heat, warmth; solar heat.
